text:
@realDonaldTrump I feel confident that our Country is screwed
-40 Million unemployed 
-over 100,000 died from COVID-19
-20% of American children are going to bed hungry
-Look at the Stock Market the richest 10% of Americans control around 85% of the Market are making Millions and even Billions.
